title: ICTA Chairman resigns hours after social media ban in Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Technology says the Chairman of the Information and Communication Technology Agency (ICTA), Oshadha Senanayake has tendered his resignation.
When inquired on the matter, Technology Ministry Secretary, Jayantha de Silva said Oshada Senanayake resigned from the post as he is set to migrate for employment overseas.
ICTA Chairman resigns hours after social media ban in Sri Lanka
